con:interface.name: RetrieveClientSummariesSoapBinding
con:interface.con:content:
<wsdl:definitions name="RetrieveClientSummariesService" targetNamespace="http://example.com/c360/services" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://example.com/c360/services">
<wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://example.com/c360/services"> <xsd:element name="RetrieveClientSummariesRequest" type="xsd:string"/> <xsd:element name="RetrieveClientSummariesResponse" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types>
<wsdl:message name="InputMessage"><wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:RetrieveClientSummariesRequest"/></wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="OutputMessage"><wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:RetrieveClientSummariesResponse"/></wsdl:message>
<wsdl:portType name="ClientServicePortType"> <wsdl:operation name="RetrieveClientSummaries"> <wsdl:input message="tns:InputMessage"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:OutputMessage"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType>
</wsdl:definitions>
